name: Markdown Editing - Section Adder
description: Adds a new section to a markdown file. The section title and content are generated by the AI based on the given user prompt. The section is inserted either after, before, or at the end of the most relevant existing section, as determined by the prompt and file content.
author: @@official.shinkai

md_file_path.description: Path to the target markdown (.md) file

prompt.description: A user prompt describing the topic and details for the new section to be added
